definitions.definition: A diploid individual that has different alleles at one or more genetic loci .
A bacteriophage that has two different copies of its genetic material and so produces two types of offspring .

main_definition: ( genetics ) A diploid individual that has different alleles at one or more genetic loci .
secondary_definitions: ( biology ) A bacteriophage that has two different copies of its genetic material and so produces two types of offspring .
